title: Android 13 has new taskbar and multi-window features just for PCs
content:
After many years of neglect, Google has finally started to pay attention to Android on large-screen devices. The recent Android 12L update (also known as Android 12.1) added a taskbar and updated layouts for tablets and foldables, and now Android 13 is building upon that with new interface tweaks specifically for Android running on desktop

The post Android 13 has new taskbar and multi-window features just for PCs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: oogle is working on new taskbar tweaks and improved multi-window for Android 13 when it's running on desktop and laptop PCs.
